Articles.Content:
Hi! I was lurking for a while, and finally, after the first landing Mun I decided to write on the forum (mainly to show my flag )

In the older versions I was building a space station, with the help of various mod, but the first Mun landing with the stock version was decisive, the most satisfying thing

(I'm Italian, despite the russian write on the flag, who means "Aperture Express", if Google translated it well XD )
Good job on the mun visit! It is a feat for anyone new! Good luck on future landings!

Welcome to the forums!

If you ever need any help accomplishing any of your missions, be sure to check out the Drawing Board (link in my sig), which has a number of tutorials and other reference materials. You can also ask questions in the How To section of the forums. If you think you'd understand the answers better in your native Italian, we also have an International forum you can use.

Happy landings!

"Kerbin Rise"....

eerily reminiscent of the Earth Rise taken by one of the Apollo crews.
